text: Harrisburg is an unincorporated community in Gallia County, in the U.S. state of Ohio. ==History== Harrisburg was platted in 1837. A variant name was Harris. A post office called Harris was established in 1857, and remained in operation until 1905. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in Gallia County, Ohio Category:1837 establishments in Ohio Category:Populated places established in 1837 Category:Unincorporated communities in Ohio
title: Harrisburg, Gallia County, Ohio
